Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアス
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign

Entry.JapaneseText: 獣王山
Entry.EnglishText: Mount Sovereign

Entry.JapaneseText: ここが王家の聖所……
Entry.EnglishText: This must be the Royal Sanctuary...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… ここにゲオルギアスの身体が 眠っているんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Right, Geyorkias's body must lie within.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく役立たずどもめ…… 時間稼ぎすらできないとは。
Entry.EnglishText: What a disappointment! To think that those imbeciles couldn't even do something as simple as stall for time!

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ!? なぜおまえがここに!?
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva! What are you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえたちには 聖獣王の力は渡さぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: I will not hand over the power of the King of the Sacred Beasts to the likes of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？
Entry.EnglishText: What?

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王の力を手に入れ、 世界を救うのはこの私だ。 だが……
Entry.EnglishText: I shall be the sole inheritor of Geyorkias's power, so that I can bring about the salvation of this world. Though...

Entry.JapaneseText: その世界に、 ヒューマはいない。
Entry.EnglishText: ...The world that I save shall be void of Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: この地上から、愚かで醜い ヒューマという不純物を取り除き、 ガジュマだけの国を作るのだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are a foolish, unsightly blight that I will purge from this land. In doing so, I shall build a nation solely for Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだと……!?
Entry.EnglishText: What?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 選ばれし民、ガジュマの国…… ガジュマだけが生きる理想の国…… カレギア……
Entry.EnglishText: A Kingdom for the chosen... An ideal nation where only Gajuma live... Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: その理想の国を、 この私が導くのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: And I will be the one to pave the way toward this ideal country!
Entry.Notes: so she says nation in the line a above. then she says country here. Maybe go with kingdom instead? I think that would fit better, but that's up to you, Lauren. -dragon.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が理想の国だ!! ふざけんじゃねえ!!
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing ideal about that at all! You've lost your damn mind!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちが何と言おうと、 それが聖獣王の意思……
Entry.EnglishText: You can say what you like, but that is the will of the King of the Sacred Beasts himself...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は、聖獣王に 選ばれし者なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: For I have been chosen by him!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたのその仕草……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, I know that gesture...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't tell me...!

Entry.JapaneseText: バースのラドラス陛下に 対する謀り事は……ジルバ、 すべておまえの仕業だったのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs's plot against King Ladras... Zilva, was that all your doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: フフフ…… もはや隠す必要もあるまい。 おまえの想像どおりさ、<Eugene>。
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe... There's no point in hiding it now. It is just as you suspect, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドクター・バースの身体と入れ替わり、 ラドラスに毒を盛ったのも、 おまえを殺そうとしたのもこの私……
Entry.EnglishText: I switched bodies with Doctor Barrs and used him to poison Ladras, and to make an attempt on your life as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 入れ替わりだと!? まさか、おまえも <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を……!?
Entry.EnglishText: You switched bodies?! Then that means you also have the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: フッ……そういう事さ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph. You are correct.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、逆に刺されてしまうとは 思わなかったがな。
Entry.EnglishText: I will admit that I didn't expect to get stabbed in return...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まあ、結果的に邪魔者が 排除できた事には変わらない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...But no matter, I was still able to rid myself of the biggest obstacle to my plans...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなたが…… あなたがお父さんを……
Entry.EnglishText: So it was you... You're the one who got my father killed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハハ……感じるだろう？ 聖獣王は間もなく復活する。
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha... You can feel it, can you not?! Soon the King of the Sacred Beasts shall return to this world...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマを滅ぼすために！
Entry.EnglishText: ...And bring about the annihilation of all Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテを使っての復活は失敗したが、 今度は、今度こそは…… ハハハハ……
Entry.EnglishText: Using Agarte for that end resulted in a failure, but not this time. Why, this time... Ahahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下をたぶらかしたのもおまえか！ おのれジルバ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then it was you who manipulated Her Majesty into performing that ritual! Zilva, you wretched...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハハ、今頃わかったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Ahahaha! You're just now figuring this out?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえさえいなくなってしまえば、 世間知らずの小娘を操るなど、 他愛もなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: It was absurdly easy to manipulate such a naive girl with you no longer in the picture!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの身体が欲しければ ゲオルギアスを甦らせろ、ひいては それが国のためだとささやくだけで、 すべてが面白いように転がった。
Entry.EnglishText: I just had to convince her that by resurrecting Geyorkias, she could get the body of a Huma, all the while saving the Kingdom... And then things got interesting!

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ……貴様…… アガーテの気持ちを利用して……！ そのせいでクレアも……！
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva, you monster! Taking advantage of Agarte's feelings... Dragging Claire into this mess...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえのような奴に、 ゲオルギアスの力は渡さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never let Geyorkias's power fall into the hands of someone like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハハハハ…… おまえたちの死をもって、 新しい世界の幕開けとしよう じゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha! Then your deaths shall mark the beginning of my new world!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ぎゃあぁぁぁぁぁぁぁッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: GYAAAAH!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: シャクだね……シャクだよ!! この私が……私の夢を…… メチャクチャにしやがってぇぇぇッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Now you've really pissed me off! My dream... You've gone and ruined my dream!

Entry.JapaneseText: やはりあの時、おまえを 殺しておくべきだった…… <Eugene>……<Eugene>…… <Eugene>・ガラルドォォォォッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I knew I should have finished you off when I still had the chance, <Eugene>... <Eugene>... <Eugene> Gallardo!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……だが、おまえたちも終わりだ!! アハハハハハ…… どうせ、ヒューマは滅ぼされるのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Make no mistake, however... This is it for you as well! Ahahaha! Huma shall be eradicated regardless...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちがよみがえらせる 聖獣王によってな……フフフ…… キャハハハハハハ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...At the hands of the King of the Sacred Beasts that you have come to resurrect! Hehehe... Gyahahahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスは…… オレたちが説得してみせる！
Entry.EnglishText: After we revive him... We're going to convince him otherwise!

Entry.JapaneseText: 説得だと……ハハハ…… 無駄な事を……フフフフ…… せいぜい悪あがきするがいいさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Convince him? Hahaha...! A futile endeavor... Ahaha...! Well, go ahead and try, if you dare!

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の首をとりたいか？ ヒヒヒヒヒ……
Entry.EnglishText: Do you want to finish me off? Ahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: 親子愛…… 泣かすじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, the love a child has for their parents! It's enough to bring a tear to one's eye...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヘドが出るよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: And bile to one's throat!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お父さん……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Father...

Entry.JapaneseText: バース……
Entry.EnglishText: Barrs...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ終わっちゃいない!! 早くゲオルギアスを 復活させるんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: This isn't over yet, guys! Hurry and revive Geyorkias!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、やるぞ！ オレたちの想いのすべてを ゲオルギアスに伝えるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's do this! We need to convey our hearts— our ideals— to Geyorkias!
Entry.Notes: not sure about this dash character used here. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王ゲオルギアス…… オレたちに力を貸してくれ！ この災いを止めるために……
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias, King of the Sacred Beasts... Lend us your power! Help us avert this catastrophe!

Entry.JapaneseText: もう……遅い……
Entry.EnglishText: It is already...too late...

Entry.JapaneseText: 遅い？ 何の事だ……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Too late? What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: 大空に邪なる心が満ちる時、 災いの獣、降り立ち、 大地に破滅をもたらす……
Entry.EnglishText: When the hearts of the wicked fill the skies, the Beast of Calamity shall descend from above and lay waste to the earth...

Entry.JapaneseText: その名をユリスと呼ぶ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...And it shall bear the name Yuris.

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリス!?
Entry.EnglishText: Yuris?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 汝らが我を倒した時に飛び散った 思念は、我のものではない。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Will<White> that scattered about after you defeated me was not my own.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれはユリスの思念。
Entry.EnglishText: It belonged to Yuris.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだって……？
Entry.EnglishText: What the...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 長年、我がユリスを抑えつけてきた。
Entry.EnglishText: For many years, I had been able to contain it.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの時、ユリスの思念は 我が縛めを逃れ、 世界中に飛び散った。
Entry.EnglishText: But upon my defeat, Yuris's <Blue>Will<White> had escaped from me, and spread throughout the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: 思念は<Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ 憎しみやねたみといった感情を 増長させた。
Entry.EnglishText: Its <Blue>Will<White> intensified the feelings of hatred and envy that people held.

Entry.JapaneseText: 思念は汝らによって浄化されたが、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ負の感情は残った。
Entry.EnglishText: And though you had freed them from that <Blue>Will<White>, the negative emotions held by <Yellow>Mankind<White> lingered on.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、その感情が ユリスを生む……
Entry.EnglishText: And from those emotions, Yuris has been given life.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が名をかたり、ジルバを操り、 世界を混乱に導きし……
Entry.EnglishText: That which assumed my identity... That which manipulated Zilva and led the world into chaos...

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、今、自ら形をなすは 世界を殺す剣、万物の敵……
Entry.EnglishText: And that which now takes the form of a sword that shall slay the world, the enemy of creation itself...

Entry.JapaneseText: それが破滅のもの、ユリス……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is the Beast of Calamity, Yuris.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアス!!
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんて事……!! ゲオルギアスですら 歯が立たないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe it... Even Geyorkias is powerless against it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒトの負の感情が生み出した…… あれがユリスの力なのか……！
Entry.EnglishText: The darkness that lurks within the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White>... Is that really the source of Yuris's power?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 終わりだ…… 世界は破滅する……
Entry.EnglishText: This is indeed the end. The world shall come to ruin...

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスを倒す方法は ないんですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Is there truly no way to defeat it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスを生んだ <Yellow>ヒト<White>の負の感情は強大すぎる…… もはや……希望はない……
Entry.EnglishText: The negative emotions that begat Yuris have grown too strong. We are without hope...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだだ…… まだオレたちはやれる……!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! There must be something we can do about this!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、黙って死ぬなんて まっぴらだぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I'm not going down without a fight!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐあああァァッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Guaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uwaaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぬおぉぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uwooh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: キャァァァァッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: わああぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Waaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐっ……ダメだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... We're done for...

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に…… もう何もできないの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is there really... nothing we can do?

Entry.JapaneseText: このままユリスに 滅ぼされちゃうなんて イヤだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Yuris is going to kill us all... This can't be happening!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こっているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What just happened?

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスの領域ができたのだ…… やがてそれは世界を呑み込み、 全てを消し去る……
Entry.EnglishText: Yuris's realm has begun to take form... Soon it shall devour this world and eradicate everything in its wake.

Entry.JapaneseText: チクショウ……
Entry.EnglishText: Damnit...!

Entry.JapaneseText: こうなる前に……<Yellow>ヒト<White>を 滅ぼしておくべきだった……
Entry.EnglishText: I should have...eradicated <Yellow>Mankind<White> before any of this had come to pass...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、今となっては……
Entry.EnglishText: But now, it is too late.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちは戦う……
Entry.EnglishText: ...We'll fight it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無駄だ……我に倒せぬものを…… <Yellow>ヒト<White>の力で何ができる……
Entry.EnglishText: That is a fruitless endeavor. If I am not capable of stopping it... Then how could the power of <Yellow>Mankind<White> ever hope to?

Entry.JapaneseText: うるせぇ!! あきらめたら、 そこで終わりだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, just shut up! If we give up now, then that's it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なぜだ…… なぜ汝らは戦おうとする…… 恐れはないのか……
Entry.EnglishText: Why... Why do you still fight...? Are you not afraid?

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖いです…… でも信じあえる仲間がいるから、 どんな事にも立ち向かえるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: We are... But because we believe in each other, we can stand against anything that comes our way.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、ゲオルギアス、 ボクたちが負けたら、 後はよろしくネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, Geyorkias, if we're defeated, then the rest is up to you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ユリスの領域は広がり続け、 やがて、暗黒が世界を覆い、 破滅を迎える……
Entry.EnglishText: Should Yuris's Realm continue to spread, the world shall be enveloped in darkness and thus, meet its doom.
Entry.Notes: minor flourish to help with flow. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ユリスを倒さぬ限り、 世界を救う事はできぬ……
Entry.EnglishText: Only through defeating Yuris may the world be saved.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかった。 ゲオルギアス、見ていてくれ。 オレたちの戦いを……
Entry.EnglishText: We know. Geyorkias... Watch over us in this battle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: There wasn't anything the last time we were here...
Entry.Notes: I believe dialogue changes on character - this one's Veigue

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: It's my lucky day! There wasn't anything the last time we were here!
Entry.Notes: This one's Mao fixed line break, but dupes. :( -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... I don't think there was anything the last time we were here...
Entry.Notes: This one's Eugene I think fixed line break, but dupes. :( -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I never expected to find something here, of all places...

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, would you look at that! To think I'd discover something here!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: How'd this get here...? Well, I guess things like that just happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess this means you can still find things in places you've already been...
Entry.Notes: removed double instance of the word "places." -dragon. but dupes

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to discover things in other places that we've already been to!
Entry.Notes: removed trailing white space, but dupes. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose we might find things in places that we've already visited.
Entry.Notes: fixed linebreak and trailing white space, but dupes. :( -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we can find new things if we explore places we've already been...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe we can find new things in other places we've been to too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to find things in other places we've been to if we stop by them again...

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
